markdown.markdown:
**AAI**\
Authentication, Authorisation & Identification – for example, Eduroam is an AAI system

**API**\
Application Programming Interface

**csv**\
comma separated values – a file format

**ELN**\
Electronic Lab Notebook

**EPMA**\
Electron-Probe Micro-Analyser

**FAIR**\
Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reproducible

**GU**\
Goethe Universität Frankfurt am Main

**IfG**\
Institut für Geowissenschaften (Institute for Geosciences) at the GU Frankfurt am Main

**L-value**\
The distance of the analyser crystal from the sample in a JEOL EPMA.


**TAPL**\
The large (L) type Thallium-Phthalat-Acid (TAP) analyser crystal.
